barrage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the continuous firing of guns, dropping of bombs etc, especially to protect soldiers as they move towards an enemy
barrage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a lot of criticism, questions, complaints etc that are said at the same time, or very quickly one after another
barrage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a wall of earth, stones etc built across a river to provide water for farming or to prevent flooding
